name: SCNLN
description:
An early alpha of a little game I've made over the past two nights.

Right now there's just one level. The objective is to get to the green and blue striped squares. The ? doesn't work for now.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move. Click the buttons to fire or use health kits (once you've picked them up.)

There are three 'achievements' you can get while you make your way to the objective:

1. Use no Health Kits and make it to the objective.

2. Kill everyone and survive to the objective.

3. Pacifist: Kill no-one and survive to the objective.

Getting all those, it will probably only take you a couple minutes. So consider this release a Ground Zeroes to the coming Phantom Pain... I should get to bed.

Chris

For updates on my latest projects, follow me on Twitter.
